text:
SALEM

District Administration: Mini-marathon and walkathon to create awareness on people discharging their democratic rights during the elections, flag off, Mahatma Gandhi stadium, 7 a.m.

Confederation of Indian Industry and Young Indians-Salem chapter: Interaction session with Sana Iqbal, solo bullet rider from Hyderabad, on all India two-wheeler expedition, Sona College of Technology, 11 a.m.

Periyar University: Department of Journalism and Mass Communication, ‘View Finder 2016’ workshop series on media skills, ‘film appreciation session “construction and destruction of films”, 10 a.m.; Department of Geology: national level seminar on ‘environmental impact on earth resources and future challenges’ sponsored by DST and UGC, 4.30 p.m.; Department of Economics: national level workshop on ‘time series modelling and forecasting’, 4.30 p.m.

The Kavery Engineering College, Mecheri: Department of Civil Engineering, ‘Genitor 2k6’ national level technical symposium, 9.30 a.m.

District Employment Exchange: Training programme for the Staff Selection Commission aspirants,

10 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

Paavai Engineering College: Department of MCA, seminar on ‘introduction to building mobile apps with Xamarin’, 9.30 a.m.

Mahendra Engineering College: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Lecture on special electrical machines, 10 a.m.

Gnanamani College of Technology: Department of Science and Humanities, national level technical symposium on ‘Gnan Cehmp 2k16’,

10 a.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

KSR Institute of Technology: National level conference on ‘recent trends in engineering and technology’, V. N. Mani, Scientist-E, C-MET, Hyderabad, chief guest, 10 a.m.

RASIPURAM

Muthayammal Engineering College: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, and Information Technology, national level technical symposium, 10 a.m.

ERODE

Shree Venkateshwara Hi-Tech Engineering College: NCIESM 2K16 -National Conference on Innovation in Engineering Sciences and Management, 9 a.m.

EBET Group of Institutions: Mech Conflict 2016 - An Intra-Department Technical Treat, 4.30 p.m.

Nandha College of Technology: Talk on ‘Capital Budgeting’ 9.30 a.m.

Nandha Engineering College: CIM 2K16 - National-level Technical Symposium by Departments of CSE, IT and MCA, 10 a.m.

Erode Sengunthar Engineering College: Lecture on ‘Probability and Queuing Theory’ 10 a.m.
title: engagements
